actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Space Science Applications.

official_title: A bill to provide that the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration may accept gifts and donations for construction of a space shuttle orbiter, and that such orbiter shall be named Challenger II.

summary.text: Amends the National Aeronautics and Space Act of 1958 to authorize the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to accept gifts or donations to build a manned space shuttle which shall be named Challenger II.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration may accept gifts and donations for construction of a space shuttle orbiter, and that such orbiter shall be named Challenger II.
